text: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Oristano () is a metropolitan see of the Roman Catholic Church in Sardinia, Italy. It was created in the eleventh century. Its only suffragan is the Diocese of Ales-Terralba. Since 2019 the Archbishop of Oristano has been Roberto Carboni. ==Archbishops== *1202–1223 mons. Bernardo *1224–1253 mons.
